name: spotifyhalloffame
description: You can find information about the Hall of Fame features, schema, and wireframes here. * [Features](https://github.com/sarahshihmi/spotifyhalloffame/wiki/Features): for understanding what this app can do. * [Wireframes](https://github.com/sarahshihmi/spotifyhalloffame/wiki/Wireframes): for a high-level design overview. * [Database Schema](https://github.com/sarahshihmi/spotifyhalloffame/wiki/Database-Schema): for a in-depth look of how data is connected. * [User Stories](https://github.com/sarahshihmi/spotifyhalloffame/wiki/User-Stories): for understanding why we have these features.
